To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private MassIndex _mass;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_mass = MASS(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_mass.IsReady)
{
    var current = _mass.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.mass = self.MASS(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.mass.IsReady:
    current = self.mass.Current.Value
